Perform LaTeX escaping

Source: R/helpers.R
escape_latex.Rd

Text may contain several characters with special meanings in LaTeX. This function will transform a character vector so that it is safe to use within LaTeX tables.

escape_latex(text)

Arguments

text

a character vector containing the text that is to be LaTeX-escaped.

Value

A character vector.

Function ID

7-20

See also

Other Helper Functions: adjust_luminance(), cell_borders(), cell_fill(), cell_text(), cells_body(), cells_column_labels(), cells_column_spanners(), cells_grand_summary(), cells_row_groups(), cells_stubhead(), cells_stub(), cells_summary(), cells_title(), currency(), gt_latex_dependencies(), html(), md(), pct(), px(), random_id()
